phrases: If Crusch-sama's goal should be attained,
I am sure it would suit your desires, Wilhelm-dono.
I expect the best.
My, how unusual it is to see you!
My apologies.
I am the treasurer of the capital's merchant guild.
My name is Russell Fellow.
It is a pleasure to meet you,
Natsuki Subaru-dono.
Wilhelm-san, who was that?
Russell Fellow.
Despite what he said,
he is shrewd, dealing in all of the capital's inner and outer financial matters.
Now, I was just about to head back inside...
Do you have something to say?
People calling themselves
the Witch's Cult plan to attack Roswaal's domain in three days.
I want to ask for your help in stopping them.
I see.
So they have made their move.
It seems so.
Of course, from the moment that Emilia-sama, a half-elf, entered the scene,
we foresaw something like this happening.
I understand the situation.
My next question is how you chose me to assist you.
Because, to be honest, you seem the most likely to help right now.
You have helped Rem and me
Do not misunderstand.
I helped you two because I was contracted to do so.
If you wish to negotiate, you need to show me what I stand to gain.
Otherwise, there is nothing to negotiate.
If, with my assistance,
you can eliminate the threat posed by the Witch's Cult,
what would my profit be?
Tell me that.
If you help me out with this problem,
I will owe a huge debt to your camp.
Should I accept the proposal,
it would mean Emilia's withdrawal from the royal selection.
You understand that?
What did you expect?
To place your own domain's survival in the hands of another lord calls
into question your ability to rule the nation.
With that in mind, I ask you again...
If you incur a debt to me through this deal,
it will mean the elimination of Emilia's camp from the race.
Are you sure you want that?
Even still...
I want your help.
If she dies, everything ends, anyway.
Understood.
In that case, the Karsten family will render no assistance whatsoever.
Huh?
First of all, the condition of Emilia's withdrawal,
which you offered in desperation as an advantage to me...
It carries no weight in this negotiation.
But why?
Is not removing one of your rivals enough compensation?!
Are you really not aware?
Emilia's elimination from the royal selection
will happen with or without my involvement.
Then you will let the Witch's Cult slaughter
all of those villagers in Roswaal's domain?!
Do not change the subject, Natsuki Subaru.
It is Emilia who lacks the power to protect that domain.
And Emilia whose people will die for her incompetence.
It is not I.
B-But is not knowing people will die and not stopping it wrong?
If you have the power to save them, why would not you?!
Hey, I have heard enough
It is fine.
Allow me to correct one idea you have.
Say the Witch's Cult does make a move.
That what you say comes to pass.
However, the problem comes afterward.
Afterward?
It is simple.
How do you know when or where they will attack?
Th-That is...
If you are a member of the Witch's Cult,
it would make sense.
That is bull
Crusch-sama, please do not make jokes.
Of course Subaru-kun is not a Witch's Cult member.
Really?
Given what he says,
if he cannot explain how he knows these details,
I can draw no other conclusion.
Have you never sensed any such inclination in him?
Never.
Regardless, I cannot lend assistance to Emilia
The Witch's Cult is coming!
They will slaughter everyone in the village...
Kill them.
We just have to kill them!
All we have to do is kill every single bastard in that cult!
That will solve everything!
Everything!
You get that, right?
We cannot let those bastards live!
I am going to kill them!
Please help me!
Is this why you behave as you do?
Your hatred for the Witch's Cult...
Is that your real reason for approaching Emilia?
No, I
What else but murderous intent could one call that glint in your eye?
You are suggesting I am using Emilia as a pretense for revenge against them?!
My hatred has nothing to do with how evil they are!
They cannot be allowed to live...
That is why we have to kill every one of them!
That will save everyone!
I am certain I have told you, Natsuki Subaru.
That if your own lie does not fool you, it will not deceive others.
Why...
You do not know why?
You have not once said
that you want to save Emilia.
I cannot allow you to come any closer.
Subaru-kun,
please calm down.
I can generally tell when the person with whom I speak is lying.
I am quite proud of the fact that I have never been deceived in negotiations.
Speaking from those years of experience,
I can say you are not lying.
W-Well, then...
You adamantly believe that your rant is true.
That is nothing short of madness,
Natsuki Subaru.
Felis, heal his lip.
Do not bother!
Rem, let us go.
Do you have anywhere else to turn?
I hope you become a great ruler...
The kind of dictator who abandons the weak.
In my master's stead, I thank you
for the care you have given us.
What will we do?
If what you say is true, we have little time.
If it is true?
We have little time.
Shall we return to Roswaal-sama's mansion?
No, there is not much the two of us could do by going back now.
There are not enough of us.
What the hell is Roswaal doing?
Roswaal-sama has been required to visit some officials within the domain.
He will stay with them for a few days.
That is why he cannot do anything about the attack?
Then, unless we find reinforcements, we will not get anywhere.
What about Reinhard?
Would not he help us?
Yesterday, he said that he would be
away from the capital for a while on a courtesy call.
Damn it!
Why are you all so useless?!
Tomorrow, we will have to look for someone else to help us.
You head to the knights' station.
I am going to talk to one of the other candidates.
Very well.
The Witch's Cult?
Yes.
If left alone, they will hurt lots of people.
Emilia will not be their only victim.
I want to defeat them before that happens!
That is why I
Amusing...
You are amusing!
Indeed.
Any jester who makes it this far has mastered his act...
Wh-What is so funny about this?
I can appreciate your desperation,
but you have not thought things through.
In trying to aid your ally, you corner them, benefit the enemy, and lose all control.
You are better off dying.
In fact, I could just lop off your head for you right now.
Still, even in the face of such harsh treatment,
the devotion you show for your master is commendable, if nothing else.
So...
I will give you an opportunity.
A-An opportunity?
Yes, an opportunity.
What you would call a chance.
Lick it.
Huh?
Crawl on the floor,
savoring the shame and humiliation.
And like a wretched beast,
like a baby suckling on its mother's teat,
lick my foot.
If you can do that, I will consider your proposal.
If you do not want to, that is fine...
If you would rather favor your minuscule pride
and abandon the mistress you wagged your tail for to the wasteland, fine.
Either choice you make will entertain me.
F-Fine.
I guess you really are just an insignificant man!
What you just displayed was neither loyalty nor devotion.
It is something more filthy, like a dog's dependence or a pig's greed,
you lazy pig who knows only how to want!
A pig's greed is the ugliest thing there is!
Even if the Witch's Cult is defeated,
I will strike down any camp you are part of!
Your careless behavior and attitude have led me to that decision!
Aldebaran.
Hey, now...
What happened in here?
Throw that detestable fool out of here.
Or kill him if you want.
It matters not.
I think that matters quite a bit.
Let us go, brother.
Do not get so mad, Princess.
That fierce look will make your cute face drop in value.
Unless you want your ruined face further ruined,
take him away at once, Aldebaran.
I have told you not to call me that...
Can you stand, brother?
Yeah.
You seem okay.
I do not know what you were discussing,
but it looks like it did not go very well.
If I take too long,
she might seriously tell me to chop you in half,
so I am heading back.
Later, brother.
That damn stuck-up bitch...
She is forgetting that I saved her when we first met!
Change gears.
This is no time for those idiots to bog me down.
Sniff, sniff.
Sniff, sniff.
That looks super painful!
Are you okee?
Huh?
You smell like blood, and not just from your lip.
Was your nose bleedy?
Now, Mimi, no getting into mischief.
'Kay!
I am awful sorry she is been botherin' you.
Hmm?
Are not you...
Right, you are Natsuki-kun.
Emilia's knight, Natsuki Subaru-kun.
Are not this a coincidence?
Anastasia Hoshin...
Let us eat!
So, about the dragon-drawn carriage...
You do not beat around the bush.
You will not make anyone happy by prioritizin' your own goals.
Trying to get on the other's good side is the basic rule of negotiation.
That is where you are lackin', Natsuki-kun.
Sorry, but I have got a real problem here.
I want to leave the capital tomorrow, so...
When you are up against my kind,
tryin' to appeal to sentimentality is the worst strategy there is.
But I applaud your effort.
It is no easy task to find a dragon-drawn carriage in the capital right now.
Apparently, someone is buyin' up all of'them.
Here.
The place at this address should have a carriage left.
I have signed it with my own name.
This will square everything away.
Do not put on airs...
I surely will put on airs.
It is no fun if I just hand it to ya normally, right?
I just wanted to chat with ya about this an' that.
Why bother with that?
You do not gain anything from it.
I believe there is nothing in this world that has no meaning.
You never know who might give ya some inspiration.
What do we talk about?
Hey, my lady,
I want to eat some more!
Can I order?
Sure.
Eat all ya like.
Oh, but do not get your mouth all messy with sauce.
Wipe my face, please!
Yay!
I will be back!
Despite her looks,
she is second-in-command in my private army.
Private army?
Um, um, I want this, too!
And also, um, um...
It is quite famous in Kararagi.
The Hoshin Company's personal mercenary squad, Iron Fang.
Are not she super cute?
Nothing beats sleepin' with her in your arms!
Lately, lots of people have been gatherin' in the capital.
Have you noticed the atmosphere's different now, Natsuki-kun?
Now that you mention it, everyone did seem to be in a frenzy.
Because of the royal selection?
When those on top move, the people move.
When the people move, things move.
By the way, the value of things in the capital is fluctuatin' a lot now.
Some of the most valuable products are iron goods.
Weapons, like swords and spears, are bein' gathered from both inside and outside.
Iron and weapons?
They are not planning to go to war with those things, are they?
It is also possible their objective is not to acquire the items,
but gettin' the economy rolling.
The way you said that...
Is it well known who is gathering all this iron?
It is someone you know well, Natsuki-kun.
Duchess Crusch Karsten.
It is Crusch?
Come to think of it, she did have a constant stream of visitors...
I get it.
That is why that Russell guy was there.
Russell Fellow?
He is quite a big fish.
This has been fairly informative.
Thank you, Natsuki-kun!
After fightin' with Crusch-san last night, you just left her place, right?
I figured it would be easy to learn
all sorts of information from your mouth, eyes, and expressions!
You set me up from the start?
Are you happy with yourself,
using underhanded methods like that?
If ya want to convince someone you are righteous,
you have got to show something to merit it.
And I see no such thing in you.
The only way to change your reputation is to replace it with another.
The things you have done are what determine your reputation.
That is, your past.
And there is no way to change your past,
so my opinion of ya is not going to change, either.
The things you have done will not ever go away.
You do not want to get any closer to my lady.
I am super strong, you know.
Thanks, Mimi...
But you do not have to do anything.
There is nothing Natsuki-kun can do, anyway.
Both of you are absolute scum!
Screw you both!
I guess Julius's efforts went to waste...
It is partly my fault, though.
I guess not even you would do something that dumb.
I am relieved.
Mimi, let us go.
'Kay!
One last thing.
The key to negotiation is how prepared you are before ya come to the table.
Know what the other person wants, and dangle it in front of'them.
And since all you do is want, that is where you are lacking.
Now, shall we go, everyone?
See ya later!
Bye-bye!
Damn it!
Subaru-kun, what is wrong?
Did something happen?
Nothing!
Rem, how did it go?
I reported the maneuvers by the Witch's Cult to the knights' station.
I gave them Roswaal-sama's name, but...
Not the response we wanted?
It seems the knights have received several such reports already.
Since the Cult's background is unclear,
they said they receive countless unverifiable, anonymous tips.
If that is how the real cultists stay hidden,
it is no laughing matter.
If we cannot scrape a military force together...
What shall we do?
We will go back to the mansion...
Go back and take Emilia and Ram away from there.
To the capital or to Roswaal...
Anywhere is fine.
Where they are now is dangerous!
There is no time.
We should leave now.
At this pace, we should reach the mansion by morning.
Then we will have plenty of time to take Emilia and run from the Witch's Cult.
The question is how to transport her...
That is...
From here to the Mathers domain?
Yeah.
It is already late.
Is not it too dangerous?
We were planning to camp here tonight.
Would you care to join us?
You say that, Otto...
But I bet you just want to get rid of some
of the oil in storage that you bought out of season, right?
That is not my intention at all!
Though, it is not as if I were not hoping you could use a little oil...
What is this about oil?
Oh, I just made a bit of a mistake.
And now, I have a lot of oil that is not worth much right now.
Even if we go to the capital, I do not know if I can sell it all off...
And if I cannot, I am ruined!
Ruined...
Otto, I need to talk
I mean, ask for your help.
I will buy all the oil in your carriage.
So in return, lend us transport.
All of the merchants and carriages here...
Anyone who will sell transportation for money, sell it to me!
We are transporting people!
People?!
We do not want any part in human trafficking!
I am not running that kind of side business...
There is a village near the Mathers mansion.
I want you to take its residents somewhere else!
We will, of course, thank you properly.
If we run through the night,
we should enter the Mathers domain by morning.
Sorry we cannot take breaks.
No problem!
Getting rid of my excess stock and even earning transport fees...
I feel invincible!
Subaru-kun, I am sorry.
I would like to check the map to confirm the remaining distance.
Map?
It is in your bag.
Oh, this?
It is too dark to see anything, though...
Ah, I know.
Subaru-kun, what is that?
A bit of lost technology.
I mean, it is future technology called a cell phone.
I guess it is a good thing it has some battery left, barely.
Here, look.
Natsuki-san, what is that?
Never seen a crystalight like that before.
It is a secret tool the margrave gave me.
Sorry, but you should probably forget you saw it...
Whoa, why does that sound like dark dealings that reek of nothing but money?
Just a bit farther,
and we should see Flugel's Tree.
If we head northeast from there, the Mathers domain is not far.
Flugel's Tree?
A huge tree that stands so tall in the Lifaus Highway, it seems to pierce the clouds.
Legend has it that, centuries ago, a wise man named Flugel planted it.
I see...
I cannot call that anything but amazing.
Where did the guy in the bandana go?
He did not get distracted by the tree and run off course, did he?
What is wrong, Natsuki-san?
Where did that buddy of yours go?
The older guy in the bandana,
riding on this side of us?
What are you talking about?
No one was riding on the opposite side from me.
Huh?
The Greed of a Pig
